greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of coefficients of quasi-Stirling polynomials.
link: Sergi Elizalde, Descents on quasi-Stirling permutations, arXiv:2002.00985 [math.CO], 2020. See p. 7.
program: row(n) = my(rowx = Vec(Q(n, t))); vector(n, k, rowx[k]);
results.author: _Michel Marcus_, Feb 05 2020
